name: Orkhun Inscriptions
description:
Orkhon Inscriptions   -Orhon Yazitlari 

Virtual Reality Tour in three languages (turkish,  original, english)   for   Oculus Rift and  Quest.

Türkish writings from AD 735 discovered in the valley of the Orhun River, northern Mongolia, in 1889 and  deciphered in 1893 by Danish philologist Vilhelm Thomsen.
